<Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>; Nasser Alblooshi <Nasser.Alblooshi@chalhoub.com>; Arbi Triki <Arbi.Triki@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RSO UAE - NEW STORE OPENING | Zimmermann - The Galleria Mall 
 

Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the opening of Zimmerman - The Galleria Mall.

 

The boutique team started welcoming its Guests on the  7st Aug 2025 at 10am.

 

Another amazing teamwork from all team members involved in this project : 

 

*	
	Brand team, @Dijana Catic <mailto:Dijana.Catic@me.zimmermann.com>  @Alienor Balland <mailto:Alienor.Balland@me.zimmermann.com> @Zimmermann Galleria Abu Dhabi <mailto:AbuDhabiGalleria@me.zimmermann.com>  
*	
	IT team @Jayesh Jayadevan <mailto:Jayesh.Jayadevan@chalhoub.com>  @Faisal Abdukunju <mailto:Faisal.Abdukunju@chalhoub.com>  - IT
*	
	Admin team @Pierre BAA SOLO <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>   
*	Maintenance team @Shibu Janardhanan @Sreeraj Prakasam
*	
	GA team @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com> 
*	Accounts @Ghouse Khan @Mohamed Rauf
*	Logistics / Warehouse @Sredha Mathai @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution
*	Group Security @Rawad Hossein @Ahmed Eltahan @Philip Abdou @Group Security Control Room
*	3d TEAM : @Prathap Pandiyan
*	Kronos @Irfan Yusuf <mailto:Irfan.Yusuf@chalhoub.com> 

 

Thank you All for making this project a success & Wishing record sales to the Zimmerman - The Galleria Mall! 

 

All the best, 

Retail Operations,








--------------------------------------------------

WoW, what a beauty that would add value to the Luxury Retail landscape in AbuDhabi. 

Congratulations our awesome Zimmerman AbuDhabi team and many thanks for all who been involved in bringing this fabulous beauty home. 

Love it when different teams at Chalhoub Group come together as One Team. 

All best wishes to our Zimmerman team for a great start with this amazing Brand and Boutique. 

Best Regards  مع تحياتي و تقديري،

chunks.text:
<Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>; Nasser Alblooshi <Nasser.Alblooshi@chalhoub.com>; Arbi Triki <Arbi.Triki@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RSO UAE - NEW STORE OPENING | Zimmermann - The Galleria Mall 
 

Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the opening of Zimmerman - The Galleria Mall.

 

The boutique team started welcoming its Guests on the  7st Aug 2025 at 10am.

 

Another amazing teamwork from all team members involved in this project : 

 

*	
	Brand team, @Dijana Catic <mailto:Dijana.Catic@me.zimmermann.com>  @Alienor Balland <mailto:Alienor.Balland@me.zimmermann.com> @Zimmermann Galleria Abu Dhabi <mailto:AbuDhabiGalleria@me.zimmermann.com>  
*	
	IT team @Jayesh Jayadevan <mailto:Jayesh.Jayadevan@chalhoub.com>  @Faisal Abdukunju <mailto:Faisal.Abdukunju@chalhoub.com>  - IT
*	
	Admin team @Pierre BAA SOLO <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>   
*	Maintenance team @Shibu Janardhanan @Sreeraj Prakasam
*	
	GA team @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com> 
*	Accounts @Ghouse Khan @Mohamed Rauf
*	Logistics / Warehouse @Sredha Mathai @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution
*	Group Security @Rawad Hossein @Ahmed Eltahan @Philip Abdou @Group Security Control Room
*	3d TEAM : @Prathap Pandiyan
*	Kronos @Irfan Yusuf <mailto:Irfan.Yusuf@chalhoub.com> 

 

Thank you All for making this project a success & Wishing record sales to the Zimmerman - The Galleria Mall! 

 

All the best, 

Retail Operations,
